name: Ball for One, One for Ball
name_original: Ball for One, One for Ball
description:
Can be played with 1 player but up to 4 players recommended. Each player controls one direction of the arrow keys or WASD. Work together (or don't) to collect green cubes to increase your score. Avoid red cubes!

We wanted to create a game in unreal, but we had too high expectations. So this is our backup game. We hope you enjoy.

Only a computer is needed to run

Chill 0ut

Xchel Diaz, Alex English, Joseph Stepic, Sehun Joo

Texas A&M University, Academy of Interactive Entertainment
